title: Group Learning-Based Problem-Solving Process for Hybrid Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of core mathematical concepts at the 9th-grade (middle school) level
context.additional_context: Recommending smartphone-based LMS use and regional small-group learning communities.

learning_goals: Learners can improve their ability to solve real-life application problems through team-based problem-solving activities.
Learners acquire constructive peer feedback skills during collaborative learning, strengthening their communication abilities.
Learners can cultivate logical analysis and critical thinking skills for mathematical concepts through asynchronous discussion activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
